text:
@Amy_Siskind Or more likely, Florida is doing a better job than some other states with #COVID19 testing.

Florida’s posted #coronavirus mortality rate is 4.1%, but likely mortality is closer to 1.3%. If Gov. DeSantis & Co were reporting deaths below that, you would have a point. They’re not.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
